predicate.note: Frames file for 'cringe' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to shrink back, as in fear

example.name: intransitive
example.text: When he later sided with striking hospital workers [*T*-1] , some allies [*ICH*-2] cringed a little more , concerned that Mr. Dinkins was setting the wrong tone for coming contract negotiations with city employees .
example.arg: When he later sided with striking hospital workers [*T*-1]
[ some allies [*ICH*-2]] [ concerned that Mr. Dinkins was setting the wrong tone for coming contract negotiations with city employees]
